name: Trick or Treat Sweeper - Addictive Halloween Game
name_original: Trick or Treat Sweeper - Addictive Halloween Game
description:
Trick or Treat Sweeper

This is a great guessing game for kids and just in time for Halloween.

Tap on the pumpkins to try to find the Candy with as little moves as possible!

Each level has only a certain amount of moves and gets harder the farther you get in the game.

There is only 13 levels but challenge yourself and your friends to see if you can complete level 13!

When you click the pumpkin, you may find a ghost, so be cautious as to find the candy with little moves as possible.

When you click the pumpkin and find a witch's pot, that means you're getting close but pick wisely as with every tap, your number of attempts will diminish before you know it.

Enjoy and Happy Halloween!
